ComicInfo.Title: Reflections of Evil; Road to Sorcery (Ring of Ikribu - part 3); the Oath (Rotath - part 4)
ComicInfo.Summary:
Reflections of Evil: While Conan and Red Sonja are riding south, wizard Tuzun Thune, in the guise of pictish shaman Gonar, brings his evil mirror-doubles of Conan and Sonja north to the steppes to command the Kozaks for him.
Road to Sorcery (Ring of Ikribu - part 3): Red Sonja and friends battle sorcery. Olin dies.
the Oath (Rotath - part 4): Kull and the wolf-man look for a way off of Rotath's island.
ComicInfo.Letterer: John Costanza,Janice Chiang,Michael Higgins,John Costanza,Janice Chiang,Michael Higgins
